title: anyone stuck on May 1, 2020 Google Play System update and the icon next to the text in RED?
content: Anyone stuck with the May 1, 2020 Google Play system update with a RED icon next to the text. currently, my security patch is July 5, 2020. A screenshot of the issue is attached below. i tried tapping on it and searching for the update, even via settings- about phone- android version - and google play system update, but it always said the same thing that ' Your device is up to date' I tried booting through safe mode too but still the issue persists. Can some Please HELP :) and respond to this issue. hopefully it'll be fixed. thank you.
